head.title: Generate QR code for {{FileFormatUp}} with {{ProgLang}}
head.description: The {{ProdShortName}} API enables the generation of QR codes for {{FileFormatUp}} files. Create QR codes from your content and place them on any page.

header.title: Generate QR codes for {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: Easily create 2D barcodes with text and numeric data and place them on any page of various documents using {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Learn more about {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers a wide range of features to generate and embed various types of signatures in all major document formats. It supports PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, and images. Enhance your documents with Text, Image, Barcode, QR Code, Metadata, Digital, and Stamp signatures.

more_features.title: Add signatures to your documents
more_features.description: The {{ProdFullName}} API supports signing all popular file formats. Generate, modify, search, verify, and delete different types of signatures.

feature_1.title: Sign documents
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} supports signing with Text, Image, Barcode, QR Code, and Stamp signatures. Place them on any page of any supported document format. Manage document metadata with metadata signatures, and protect the content from unauthorized changes using digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Search and verification
feature_2.content: Ensure that all signatures in a document are valid with the verification procedure. Retrieve a complete list of signatures in a document using the built-in search feature.

feature_3.title: Modify signatures
feature_3.content: Easily modify signature properties after signing. Adjust content, position, color, size, and other attributes as needed.

feature_4.title: Remove signatures
feature_4.content: Delete unwanted signatures with ease. Various signature types, including digital certificates, can be programmatically removed from documents.

formats.title: Generate QR codes for additional file formats
formats.description: Enhance all popular file formats with generated QR codes using the {{EnvName}} API. Add 2D barcode data for easy scanning and processing.

operations.title: Check out our key offerings
operations.description: We offer a diverse selection of signature features and advanced operations

examples.comment_1: Pass the document to a new {{TextSignature}} instance
examples.comment_2: Use {{QrCodeSignOptions}} to add a QR code to the document
examples.comment_3: Specify the signature type and position on the page
examples.comment_4: Save the file with the added QR code

steps.title: Steps to generate and place a QR code on {{FileFormatUp}} pages

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) can generate QR codes in many popular formats and place them on {{FileFormatUp}} pages. Over 10 QR code types are supported and can be quickly integrated into {{EnvName}} applications. Use our product to sign documents with generated QR codes.
content.step_1: Get the {{FileFormatUp}} file or stream to be signed with a QR code.
content.step_3: Customize visual options such as color, position, size, etc.
content.step_4: Save the file with the QR code.

code_1.title: How to customize a generated QR code
code_1.content: Use this example to learn how to place a new QR code on a {{FileFormatUp}} page.
code_1.comment_1: Get the document that needs to be signed and pass it to {{TextSignature}}
code_1.comment_2: Use QR code options to provide text with the required information
code_1.comment_3: Set the relative position of the QR code on the page
code_1.comment_5: Specify the color of the QR code
code_1.comment_6: Define the font options for the message
code_1.comment_7: Customize the QR code background color and brush
code_1.comment_8: Add the QR code to the document
